name: Escape
description: Ronald Tobias's archetypal plot where a character must break free from confinement or oppression
distribution_philosophy: Based on Tobias's escape structure emphasizing the imprisonment, planning, and execution of the escape
examples: The Shawshank Redemption, Room, Cast Away

imprisonment.name: Imprisonment
imprisonment.description: The protagonist finds themselves trapped or confined against their will

recognition.name: Recognition
recognition.description: The protagonist realizes they must escape and commits to action

planning.name: Planning
planning.description: The protagonist develops a plan and gathers resources for escape

execution.name: Execution
execution.description: The escape plan is put into action with mounting tension

freedom.name: Freedom
freedom.description: The protagonist achieves freedom and faces the consequences
